Title: 197: How to be Happy and Successful
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Epic Life Coach, Carl Massy. This episode is a total pause from the Data Science world as we talk about the secret to happiness. You will hear what led Carl to follow his passion for helping people find inner happiness, learn how to establish daily rituals to have a solid foundation, and get the 3 valuable tips on how to change your state of mind.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/197
